Description of incident: 1-800-Flowers customer service received reports on February 15, 2016 from customers that they couldn't complete their online orders. The company investigated and discovered from February 15th, 2016 through February 17th, 2016 orders that were placed may have been compromised customer personal information.Information compromised may have included names, addresses, email addresses, payment card numbers, expirations dates and security codes.For those that were affected can call 888-687-9294 from 9 a.m to 7 p.m EST.More Information: http://oag.ca.gov/ecrime/databreach/reports/sb24-60377
